definition: Lake Huron, one of the Great Lakes 五大湖[Wu3 da4 hu2]
to rest/to stop doing sth for a period of time/to cease/(imperative) don't

sentences.english: My father is weekending at Lake Huron .
sentences.chinese: 我父親在休倫湖度週末。

sentences.english: My father is weekending at Lake '.
sentences.chinese: 我父親在休倫湖度週末。

sentences.english: The St. Clair River empties Lake Huron on the U. S. -Canada border.
sentences.chinese: 聖克萊爾河在美加邊境注入休倫湖。
